src:
李興文兒子假扮同志　當街騷擾熟女「我可以親你嗎？」
01 Nov 2019, 09:40 by 娛樂組
李興文兒子李堉睿為了想紅，使出各種屁孩手法拍攝YouTube影片，這回終於因潛入IKEA裸體DIY遭逮，過去拍片的各種黑歷史也一一被掀出，他曾假扮同志，在路上騙吻熟女，被批評消費同志。
李堉睿早在兩年前，就以「社會實驗」的名義，在路上到處找女生說，「我是GAY，可以親妳嗎？」想當然幾乎所有女生，都一眼看穿這是個膚淺的搭訕手法，狠狠拒絕了，更不少是直接嚇到，還有熟女說：「我一眼就知道你不是，既然是同志，應該要找男生吧。」


李興文兒子的詭計一眼就被熟女看穿，狠狠打槍。（翻攝自李堉睿YouTube）



李興文兒子還當街捧起男性路人的臉，對人動手動腳。（翻攝自李堉睿YouTube）

雖然李堉睿聲明：「本人對GAY並沒有有任何的偏見，也支持所有人都能有戀愛的自由。」但依舊遭到不少網友撻伐，有人認為這樣做不只歧視同志，也是騷擾女性，相當不得體。有網友留言批評「就只是不斷騷擾別人的影片，跟你是不是gay根本無關」
更新時間｜2019.11.01 10:40
text:
Li Xingwen's son pretends to be a comrade. When the street harasses a mature woman, "Can I kiss you?"
01 Nov 2019, 09:40 by Entertainment Group
In order to think of red, Li Xingwen’s son, Li Yurui, used a variety of farts to shoot YouTube videos. This time, he was arrested for immersing himself in IKEA nude DIY. The various black history of the filmings were also taken out one by one. He once pretended to be a comrade and cheated on the road. Mature women are criticized for spending comrades.
As early as two years ago, Li Ruirui was looking for a girl on the road in the name of "social experiment". "I am GAY, can I have relatives?" Of course, almost all girls see it through a superficial approach. I refused, and many of them were directly scared. There are also mature women who said, "I know at a glance that you are not. Since you are a comrade, you should find a boy."


Li Xingwen’s son’s tricks were seen by a mature woman and beaten with a gun. (Reviewed from Li Ruirui YouTube)



Li Xingwen’s son also took the face of a male passerby in the street and moved his hands to the human hand. (Reviewed from Li Ruirui YouTube)

Although Li Ruirui stated: "I have no prejudice against GAY and support everyone's freedom of love." However, many netizens are still slashing. Some people think that this is not only discriminating against comrades, but also harassing women. body. Some netizens commented that "it is just a matter of constantly harassing others, and it has nothing to do with whether you are gay or not."
Update time |2019.11.01 10:40
